pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pyspoa![test-pyspoa](https://github.com/nanoporetech/pyspoa/workflows/test-pyspoa/badge.svg) [![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/pyspoa.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/pyspoa)Python bindings to [spoa](https://github.com/rvaser/spoa).## Installation```bash$ pip install pyspoa```## Usage```python>>> from spoa import poa>>>>>> consensus, msa = poa(['AACTTATA', 'AACTTATG', 'AACTATA'])>>> consensus'AACTTATA'>>> msa['AACTTATA-', 'AACTTAT-G', 'AAC-TATA-']>>> print(os.linesep.join(msa))AACTTATA-AACTTAT-GAAC-TATA-```## Developer Quick Start```bash$ git clone --recursive https://github.com/nanoporetech/pyspoa.git$ cd pyspoa$ python3 -m venv pyspoa$ source pyspoa/bin/activate(pyspoa) $ make build```### Licence and Copyright(c) 2019 Oxford Nanopore Technologies Ltd.pyspoa is distributed under the terms of the MIT License.
